URef< GrSoftwareTexture > GrSoftwareTextureMgr::GetTexture ( const UPath &  filePath  ) 

tries to find and return an existing software texture. If one doesn't exist, it is constructed, added, then returned.

try to find a texture with that path.

if it exists, return it.

read the entire file.

read in the image data.

purge the data from the file so that we don't keep it loaded.

construct the software texture and insert it into the map.

return the texture.
